Nikon One Touch LF35AF2

About

It's easy to learn, easy to use, and extremely portable.

How to Use

Basic instructions for using the Nikon One Touch LF35AF2:

  1. Load film (already done)
  2. Open lens cover at bottom of lens (also turns on camera)
  3. Look through the viewfinder and frame your shot
  4. Press the shutter button lightly to focus
  5. Press the shutter button fully to take the picture

Specifications

  • Lens: 35mm Nikon Lens
  • Focus: Autofocus
  • Year: 1985
